Procedure.name: setupCCC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=CCC receiversSetup=CCC initialize=CCC setSection=0,*,730.0,*,*,*,* setSection=1,*,730.0,*,*,*,* device=0 calOff restFrequency=0

Procedure.name: setupCHC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=CHC receiversSetup=CHC chooseBackend=TotalPower initialize=CHC setSection=0,*,300.0,*,*,*,* setSection=1,*,300.0,*,*,*,* device=0 calOff restFrequency=0

Procedure.name: setupKKC
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=KKC receiversSetup=KKC initialize=KKC device=0 setAttenuation=0,9 setAttenuation=1,9 setAttenuation=2,9 setAttenuation=3,9 calOff restFrequency=0

Procedure.name: setupXXP
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=XXP receiversSetup=XXP initialize=XXP setSection=0,*,730.0,*,*,*,* setSection=1,*,730.0,*,*,*,* device=0 calOff restFrequency=0

Procedure.name: setupCCCL
Procedure.body: antennaSetup=CCC receiversSetup=CCC receiversMode=NARROWBANDWIDTH initialize=CCCL setSection=0,*,300.0,*,*,*,* setSection=1,*,300.0,*,*,*,* setAttenuation=0,8 setAttenuation=1,8 device=0 calOff restFrequency=0
